text: Ya prakaraci talaka dona vela ahe. Maga ekatara bhalepanane rokhave kinva ucita ritine soduna dyave ani tumacyasathi he yogya navhe ki tumhi tyanna je kahi dile ahe, tyatuna kahi parata ghyave. Matra hi gosta vegali ki doghanna allahacya maryada kayama na rakhalya janyace bhaya asela, yastava jara tumhala bhaya asela ki he doghe allahacya maryada kayama rakhu sakanara nahita, tara strine sutaka prapta karuna ghenyasathi kahi de'una takave. Yata doghanvara kasalahi gunha nahi. Ya allahane bandhalelya sima aheta. Savadhana! Yance ullanghana karu naka ani je loka allahacya sima olandatila, te atyacari aheta
